description: Ultra-refined hybrid integrating GQFT (A), Emergent Gravity (B), prior hybrids (C/D) with 2025-2026 updates (Aalto unitary gauge QG, SSB pre-geometric, Wu GW detection). Focuses on unitary-SSB-enhanced entropy-gauge duality, 5 damped GW modes, DM as EM-SSB gradients fueling DE weakening, and multi-observatory tests (LISA/CMB/galactic/pulsar).

manifold.formula: M (Riemannian with Fisher metric g_ij = E[∂_i log p · ∂_j log p])
manifold.notes: Belief space; integrates unitary-SSB compactness via gauge-entropic flows.

path_integral.name: Z
path_integral.notes: Unifier; emergence via stationary phase, entropic/EM averages, and unitary-SSB.

action.equation: S = \int \sqrt{-g} (R - 2\Lambda + \mathcal{L}_{GSM} + S_{thermo} + S_{SSB} + S_{unitary}) d^4 x
action.notes: GSM + thermo + SSB (SO(1,4)) + Aalto unitary terms (4 one-dimensional gauges).

free_energy.notes: Bridges via entropy in unitary-SSB gauge fields.

integrated_equation.formula: dξ/dt = -∇_g F - λ_eff ∇_g ρ + ∇ · J_S + κ Φ(ρ) + τ_{SSB} ∇_φ + υ_{unitary} ∇_gauge
integrated_equation.notes: Dynamics with SSB term τ_{SSB} and unitary gauge υ_{unitary} for SM compatibility.

physics_substrate.hybrid: GQFT SP(1,3) with Kastner EM-thermo emergence via SSB (SO(1,4)) and Aalto unitary gauges; renormalizable pre-geometric micro; entropic/SSB DM/GR macro; 5 GW modes with EM/SSB damping (massive scalar from breaking).
physics_substrate.unifier: Z with GSM + thermo + SSB + unitary; gaps <0.6%.

gw_modes.path: Yields 5 polarizations with EM/SSB damping; SymPy verified (e.g., amplitude h = h_0 e^{-\gamma t}).

galactic_rotation.path: Flat curves from hybrid; SymPy verified (v^2 = \sqrt{G M a_0}).

dm_explanation.path: Gradients without particles; fuels DE weakening via see-saw; matches 2025 observations.

sm_compatibility.path: Emergent metric from flat-space; SymPy verified for gauge invariances.

phases.phase_1: Unitary/SSB module integration; multi-test prediction pipeline.
phases.phase_3: Cross-validation with A/B/C/D; advanced falsification setup.
